headline: Berkshire Hathaway Is a Great Bear Market Stock. These 2 Are Even Better Buys.
summary: Warren Buffett has delivered alpha in part by outperforming in bear markets.  Berkshire also has a number of subsidiaries in insurance and utilities that generate profits regardless of the state of the economy.  After 60 years of running Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B), Warren Buffett will be riding off into the sunset.

headline: Looming Recession? Here's What BDC Investors Should Look For
summary: Smaller BDCs like CION face risks from weak financials, while larger peers remain more attractive. See why ARCC and BXSL stand out.
